```{r}
#load libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)

# set wd
setwd("~/Desktop/TMF-matching-project") 
data2 <- read_excel("data2.xlsx")
```

```{r}
#create a bar plot
ggplot(data2, aes(x = as.factor(list.number), fill = sex)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of List Position by Gender",
    x = "List Position",
    y = "Count",
    fill = "Gender"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
